attributes.action: declaree a vote of no confidence against the current government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In almost every walk of British life the current government is seen to be nothing short of useless, It would therefore seem that the only way forwards would be for a vote of no confidence to be cast against the current Government, and a suitable alternative to be found.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
